All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bill
A class storing all necessary information of a bill/payment.
Booking
A class storing information relating to a booking made.
BookingCollection
This class stores all the bookings in use.
BookingDAO
 
BookingTableManager
This class handles updating the JTable with booking data.
Cover
A class storing information of a cover, primarily which orders belong to it.
CoverCollection
This class stores all the covers.
CoverDAO
 
CustomerDAO
 
Database
 
DishDAO
 
FOH
 
FOHController
This class implements the FOHManagementInterface and FOHKitchenInterface, providing functionalities for the Front Of House (FOH) system to communicate with management and kitchen.
FOHKitchenInterface
 
FOHManagementInterface
 
GUIUtils
This class provides utility methods for GUI components to interact with application data, such as populating UI elements with data from the database.
IBooking
 
ICustomer
 
IFrontOfHouseKitchenRequests
 
IMenu
 
IRecord

Login
 
Main
 
MenuDAO
 
MenuItem
A class representing a standard menu item (a dish).
MenuItemCollection
This class stores all the MenuItems currently on the menu.
NewOrder
 
Note
 
Notification
A static class for handling notifications.
Order
A class storing information relating to an order made by the customer.
OrderCollection
This class stores all the orders made.
OrderDAO
 
PhysicalTable
A class representing each physical table in the restaurant that is available to booking.
PhysicalTableCollection
This class stores all the PhysicalTable objects.
TabbedGUI
 
TablesDAO
 
Terminal
The main class controlling this instance of the front of house system on a machine.
TimeHelper
Provides type or format conversion of time.
WaiterDAO
 
WineItem
A subclass of MenuItem representing wines.
